title: Enhancing Deep Learning Practice Competencies: Supporting University Instructors in Strengthening Online Learning Design Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in designing in-person classes and foundational understanding of online platforms
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Instructors can improve three or more drafts of online course designs using an incremental and iterative design process.
Learners can select two or more online collaboration tools suitable for PBL projects and propose implementation strategies.
Participants can develop and apply three or more formative assessment tools operable in BYOD environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
